body:
Hi Mostapha!



Great job, and thanks for the amazing new tools for Indoor Comfort!



I just wanted to mention a small thing. Some components give an error warning when dropped into the canvas, that asks for a new version of Ladybug, even though it is updated. Deleting and re-inserting ladybug, then re-inserting the components seems to solve the issue.

Small nuance, just a heads up.



Cheers,

Theodore.
